name: Escape Bandages
description:
Multiplayer, platform, puzzle game.  

A pharaoh and one of his servants were in love, that's why two gods decide to resurrect them, to give them one more chance to live together. 

For that to work they must leave the pyramid together. 

CONTROLS:

Pharaoh: arrow keys to move, down arrow key to shoot fire. Mouse click+drag to use psychokinesis.

Mummy: WAD to move and space to use his bandages.
